Texts.Chs:
一罐番茄汤。维生素A和C的绝佳来源，包装小巧。不要与番茄酱混淆，番茄酱通常装在罐子里，是做其他食物的原料。
^green;类型：素食^reset;
Texts.Eng:
A can of Tomato Soup. A great source of Vitamin A and C in a small, compact package. Not to be confused with tomato paste, which typically comes in a jar and is used in other recipes.
^green;Type: Herbivore^reset;
